page.title: 14AN M6 TRAFFIC CENSUS
page.content:
On the{afternoon}of{Tuesday, {July 9th,1985}we went to a place{ {about two miles north}of{junction 36 to take a{traffic census}on the M6. We {started counting}vehicles at{14.05hrs. {and finished}at{14.20hrs.}Here are the details of the{vehicles}that{passed}us in that time:- {NORTHBOUND SOUTHBOUND Cars{111 }Cars{127 Lorries{40 }Lorries{75 Coaches {2 }Coaches {1 Motor Bikes{3 }Landrovers{1 Vans{9 }Vans{17 Cars & Caravans{3 }Cars & Caravans{12 {TOTAL}168 Lorry & Caravan {1 {TOTAL}234
{So,}there was an{hourly average} of {672}vehicles going{north}and{936 {going south.
